p.dialogue: "Oh, a stranger! My name's Vincent. Momma says not to talk to strangers... But you seem okay."
"That was fun! I wanna be a boat captain some day!"
"If you look close, you can see little bugs jumping out of the sand."
"Oooh! Nice find! Mom wouldn't let me keep him, though..."
"I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up! Okay! Bye!"
"I'm glad Dad's back... but he's different than I remember... Dad's not around much... I miss playing with him."
"*sigh*... Mom won't let me have any more gummies today."
"Can you keep a secret, mister? Can you keep a secret, miss? I wanna marry Miss Penny when I grow up. Just don't tell her, okay?"
"I wanna look for bugs, but Mom gets mad when I'm all dirty. It's a tough choice."
"You're not as boring as most grown-ups!"
"Ew, it's boiled beet night again... Oh no... Mom's making lentil soup tonight."
"Dad's coming back soon! I hope he brings me some toys."
"Miss Penny makes me read a new book every week. At least she lets me pick them, sometimes!"
"Dad seems weird since he came back. I wonder what happened to him? He doesn't play with me anymore. I wonder if Dad will ever come home..."
"Hi Uncle @! Hi Auntie @! Don't tell Mom... but you're my favorite grown-up."
